summary: The module provides MXNet/GluonCV implementations for scene graph generation, including an object detector based on Faster R-CNN with configurable ResNet backbones and a relational deep network that encodes bounding boxes, extracts spatial and visual edge attributes, and applies graph convolution with confidence and frequency priors to predict relationships between detected objects.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to build and experiment with visual scene understanding pipelines that detect objects and infer their interâ€‘object relationships, supporting applications such as image captioning, visual question answering, and automated content analysis.
